author: Gina P
title: Doing the best possible
text: I love all Ritz-Carlton hotels in which I have stayed, including this one. I would not have chosen this one if it had not been part of a package, only because it is not centrally located within Manhattan. It was lovely, as are all. However, if you like the luxurious soft towels and sumptuous linens, give this one a couple of years. It seems ready for some updates. It is beautifully appointed and the staff is amazing, but loud toilets and awkward internet make this one just off the usual highest marks for R-C.
